job_tasks.phrase: Set standards for engineering excellence and act as the technical guide, providing guidance to both product and technical colleagues within the team.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the responsibility to guide and set standards, implying an understanding of broader team and product goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Co-represent the Tribe's engineering at the highest levels (CTO, CPO conversations)
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in strategic discussions that require understanding of business objectives and technical alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Own architectural decisions in the tribe and influence data architecture in the wider organization.
job_tasks.justification: Influencing architecture at organizational levels necessitates understanding business needs and strategic direction.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with engineers and data scientists in the organization in order to determine needs for new software, platforms and applications both in functional and non-functional requirements.
job_tasks.justification: Determining needs for new software and applications requires understanding business requirements and translating them into technical specifications.

job_tasks.phrase: Alignment with engineering and data managers on overall technical vision for involved squads.
job_tasks.justification: Aligning on technical vision implies understanding and contributing to broader business and technical strategies.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains.
job_tasks.justification: Developing and implementing specifications in Data Science and Machine Learning Engineering domains directly relates to the creation and implementation of models.

job_tasks.phrase: Pay attention to system integration, sustainability and feasibility with an eye on the overall list of services and how new ones can integrate within the overall system.
job_tasks.justification: System integration and feasibility are core aspects of software development and architectural design.

job_tasks.phrase: Manage all phases of technology development.
job_tasks.justification: Managing technology development encompasses various stages of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Oversee and supervise the work of the development teams and guide engineers in data engineering and machine learning engineering chapters.
job_tasks.justification: Supervising development teams and guiding engineers involves managing software development processes and outputs.

job_tasks.phrase: Have an eye on Pull Requests and suggest improvements via objective input backed up with resources to help guide the engineers for better quality in the future.
job_tasks.justification: Reviewing Pull Requests and suggesting improvements are direct software development practices focused on code quality.

job_tasks.phrase: Suggest and implement solutions (either partially like spikes or via POCs) for process improvement.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing solutions like spikes and POCs is a software development practice for testing and improving processes.

job_tasks.phrase: Adhere to quality, security and scalability guidelines.
job_tasks.justification: Adhering to quality, security, and scalability guidelines is fundamental to operations engineering and maintaining production systems.

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on leadership, architectural decisions, and guiding engineering teams across Data Science, Data Engineering, and Machine Learning Engineering. It lacks specific mentions of generative AI technologies, LLM frameworks, or the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer as defined in the Coding Book. Therefore, it is classified as Ambiguous/Not Relevant.
